name: RTCTrackEvent.transceiver
description: The WebRTC API interface RTCTrackEvent's read-only transceiver property indicates the RTCRtpTransceiver affiliated with the event's track.
content: The WebRTC API interface RTCTrackEvent's read-only transceiver property indicates the RTCRtpTransceiver affiliated with the event's track. The transceiver pairs the track's receiver with an RTCRtpSender.
